dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think flight delays are just about weather, but actually, military parades can shut down entire airports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think flight delays are just about weather, but actually, military parades can shut down entire airports.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to official information from the Ministry of Defense, airspace over Astana will be closed daily from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM between April 22 and May 7, 2025, for the preparation and execution of a military parade.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like in Astana, right? The airspace is closing for a parade from April 22nd to May 7th, every day from 10 AM to 1 PM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like in Astana, right? The airspace is closing for a parade from April twenty second to May seventh, every day from ten A M to one P M.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to official information from the Ministry of Defense, airspace over Astana will be closed daily from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM between April 22 and May 7, 2025, for the preparation and execution of a military parade.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And that's affecting flights out of Almaty International Airport too, not just Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And that's affecting flights out of Almaty International Airport too, not just Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This will lead to changes in the schedule of some flights to/from Astana, including flights from Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So if you're flying during that period, you gotta check your schedule, um, because some flights might be rescheduled or delayed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So if you're flying during that period, you gotta check your schedule, um, because some flights might be rescheduled or delayed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Passengers are also advised to check the current status of their flights in advance through airline and airport information services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the airport is really emphasizing that passengers should use the contact numbers—like Air Astana's hotline or FlyArystan's WhatsApp—to get updates.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the airport is really emphasizing that passengers should use the contact numbers-like Air Astana's hotline or FlyArystan's WhatsApp-to get updates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's smart they're proactively notifying people who booked flights, using the contact info from their reservations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's smart they're proactively notifying people who booked flights, using the contact info from their reservations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Those whose flights are affected will be additionally notified by airlines using the contact details provided during booking," the airport press service stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But still, I'd double-check myself. You don't wanna show up and find out your flight's been moved by three hours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But still, I'd double-check myself. You don't wanna show up and find out your flight's been moved by three hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And it's not just a one-day thing—this is over two weeks of daily closures. That's a lot of potential disruption.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And it's not just a one-day thing-this is over two weeks of daily closures. That's a lot of potential disruption.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to official information from the Ministry of Defense, airspace over Astana will be closed daily from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM between April 22 and May 7, 2025, for the preparation and execution of a military parade.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it makes you realize how much air traffic control and, uh, military coordination goes on behind the scenes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it makes you realize how much air traffic control and, uh, military coordination goes on behind the scenes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Good thing they gave those specific phone numbers too, like the Almaty Airport Info Service at +7 (727) 270 33-33.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Good thing they gave those specific phone numbers too, like the Almaty Airport Info Service at +seven two hundred seventy thirty three to thirty three.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, having direct lines helps cut through the confusion. Still, it's a hassle for travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, having direct lines helps cut through the confusion. Still, it's a hassle for travelers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Let's hope everyone plans ahead and avoids any nasty surprises at the terminal.
